projects.title: Employee Directory
projects.description: An app that displays an Employee Directory from a random user API. The directory can be filtered to show employees based off of gender.

projects.title: The Ender Maze
projects.description: An RPG where you can create your own class and go through a maze as your character fighting enemies and solving puzzles.

projects.title: Burger Logger
projects.description: This app allows users to update a burger wish list. There is a button for each burger that, when clicked, shows that you have eaten that burger.

projects.title: Note Taker
projects.description: A note taking app that allows users to save notes to a JSON file. The user can view the notes and delete them when they are finished.

projects.title: Workout Tracker
projects.description: An application that allows you to keep up with your workouts. You can either update an existing workout, or create a new one.
